verses.text: \w A|strong="H5375"\w* psalm \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. Rejoice \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* Lord, O ye just: praise becometh \w the|strong="H5375"\w* upright.

Give praise \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* harp; sing \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w him|strong="H2803"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* psaltery, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* instrument \w of|strong="H3068"\w* ten strings.
Sing \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* new canticle, sing well unto \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* loud noise.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* word \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w is|strong="H3027"\w* right, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* all \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w works|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w done|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* faithfulness.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* loveth \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* judgment; \w the|strong="H0559"\w* earth \w is|strong="H3068"\w* full \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* word \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heavens \w were|strong="H4325"\w* \w established|strong="H3808"\w*; \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* power \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mouth:

Gathering together \w the|strong="H5437"\w* waters \w of|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* sea, \w as|strong="H0859"\w* \w in|strong="H5437"\w* \w a|strong="H5437"\w* vessel; laying up \w the|strong="H5437"\w* depths \w in|strong="H5437"\w* storehouses.

Let all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* earth fear \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* let all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* inhabitants \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* world \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* awe \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H0413"\w* \w he|strong="H7126"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H7126"\w* \w they|strong="H0369"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w*: \w he|strong="H7126"\w* commanded \w and|strong="H7126"\w* \w they|strong="H0369"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* created.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* bringeth \w to|strong="H3068"\w* naught \w the|strong="H3068"\w* counsels \w of|strong="H3068"\w* nations; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* rejecteth \w the|strong="H3068"\w* devices \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H7563"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* casteth \w away|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* counsels \w of|strong="H3068"\w* princes.

\w But|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* counsel \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* standeth \w for|strong="H7442"\w* ever: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* generations.
Blessed is the nation whose God is the Lord: the people whom he hath chosen for his inheritance.
The Lord hath looked from heaven: he hath beheld all the sons of men.
From his habitation which he hath prepared, he hath looked upon all that dwell on the earth.
He who hath made the hearts of every one of them: who understandeth all their works.
The king is not saved by a great army: nor shall the giant be saved by his own great strength.
Vain is the horse for safety: neither shall he be saved by the abundance of his strength.
Behold the eyes of the Lord are on them that fear him: and on them that hope in his mercy.
To deliver their souls from death; and feed them in famine.
Our soul waiteth for the Lord: for he is our helper and protector.
For in him our heart shall rejoice: and in his holy name we have trusted.
Let thy mercy, O Lord, be upon us, as we have hoped in thee.
